name: Robotization A Last Human D1.1
description:
August 2019. Extraterrestrial beings have spread a virus that has killed almost all people on Earth.

Your name is Alex, you are lucky that you were able to survive, you found a shelter - hospital. There is no more salvation, you are almost alone.

Robotization: A Last Human Demo is a future game in the style of Penumbra and Amnesia, but with its own story and lore.

This is updated demo - 1.1
Here you can see a new improvements and bug fixes: https://bit.ly/3NY6sE0

You can see much information on demo 1.0 page. System requirements:

Minimum:
OS:Windows 7-8-10
Video card: GTX 550 TI (not sure exactly, but it can go)
Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent from AMD
RAM: 4-6 GB
Recommended:
OS:Windows 7-8-10
Video card: GTX 1650
Processor: Intel i5 or AMD equivalent
RAM: 8 GB






Credits
Artem Yurkov - Developer, story
Matvey Orlov - Story and lore
Daniel Aupov - Soundtrack
Unreal Engine MarketPlace
